verses.1: Tuk laitak a vuk kia le an lak huna guahzu bangin mihaite adingin pahtawina a kilawmna om lo hi.
verses.2: Thu om lopi a hong kisamsiatna pen bangmah a hong cih thei lo, khawlna mun mel a nei lo, a leeng suk a leeng to phialphiah tawh kibang lel hi.
verses.3: Sakolte sat ding kisam a, late kamkaih kisam a, mihaite zong sat ding a kisam ahi hi.
verses.4: Mihaiteʼ thudotna dawngdawng lecin nang zong amau mah bangin a hai na hi hi.
verses.5: Mihaite a pilin a kingaihsut khak loh nadingin amauʼ haina tawh kizui-in dawng zaw in.
verses.6: Mihai khat kamtai-in a zang pa pen ama khe mah a sattan tawm, siatna a zong pa ahi hi.
verses.7: Khebai paʼ khe a kimanna om loin a kikhai mawk bangin mihaite adingin paunak in bangmah man nei lo hi.
verses.8: Saili kuang ah sailungtang khihcip lehang phattuamna a om loh bangin mihaite pahtawina zong a mawkna ahi hi.
verses.9: Mihaite in paunak thuhilhnate a paukhiat ciangin zukham pa in a khut a ling om a khei dingin a kipan tawh kibang lel hi.
verses.10: Mihai a tuah khak peuh tha cial a a nei pa pen a tuah khak peuh a ban kap thal tawipa tawh kibang hi.
verses.11: Ui in a luak a zuatkik bangin mihaite zong a hai tat ngei bangin takik zel hi.
verses.12: A pil lo kimlai a pil a kisa pa sangin mihaite adingin lametna om zaw lai hi.
verses.13: Thadahpa in, “Lampi ah humpinelkai om! Kongzing ah humpinelkai om!” ci-in lumlum hi.
verses.14: Kongkhak pen kawmhek tungah a kiheihei lel bangin mi thadahpa a lupna tungah kiheihei hi.
verses.15: Thadahpa in a khutin ankuang sawk suk a, a kam ah a bak tohkik ding nangawn gim zungzung kisa hi.
verses.16: A kilawmin thu a dawng thei mihing sagih sangin mi thadahpa a ngaihsutna ah pil kisa zaw hi.
verses.17: Eite tawh a kisai lo kitotna sunga kiphumna pen ui ommuang khat a bil-in i kaihsak tawh kibang hi.
verses.18: A veengte a khem khit ciangin ka ciamnuihna hi, a ci pa pen
verses.19: sih theihna gu a baang thaltang tawh a kap pa tawh kibang hi.
verses.20: Sing om kei leh mei mit a, gensiatna om kei leh kitotna bei hi.
verses.21: Meihol in mei-am ding piangsak a, sing in mei kuangsak a, migilo in kitotna piangsak hi.
verses.22: Gensiatna pen a lim mahmah an tawh a kibang hi a, mihingteʼ sung tawng pekah tum suk pahpah hi.
verses.23: Tungtham bek a kam khum pauna pen cimbeng kizut leibeel tawh kibang hi.
verses.24: A sim tat mi in a kampi bek tawh thuhoih gen a, a lungsimah zuau thu bek om hi.
verses.25: A lungsimah a deihhuai lo thu sagih tak om ahih manin kam khum takin a pau manin um kha kei in.
verses.26: Ama hoih lohna a ip nop hangin mi khempeuh in ama gitlohna thei veve hi.
verses.27: Mi siahna-in gum a tote amauʼ gum tawhna sung mahah leh kiat zawsop uh a, mi a deng kha dingin suang a khukte amauʼ suang khuk mah in amau mah lehden kha zaw hi.
verses.28: Zuaugenna in midik kimlai a mawh bangsak a, tungtham bek a thugenna in siatna bek piangsak hi.
